profile.introduction-begin: This section allows you to view the accound details you have submitted in Sunbet.com. Please make sure that the information registered here matches your documents's specifics.
profile.introduction-end: If you wish to change your password, kindly input your new password and click update. Please take note of this as you will be using it to login to your account.

acknowledgment.main:
Dear Sir/Ma'am,
This is an acknlowledgement of your Self-Exclusion request, we can confirm that your account is now Excluded until the @Model.Date.

You can see more information about our support mechanisms in the Responsible Gambling of our website. We wish you the best of luck with your future endeavours.

Best regards,
Customer Support

responsibleGamebling.introduction:
Sunbet is promoting Responsible Gambling to all players as we commit in our mission in delivering fair play for everyone. We ensure that every player 
 is provided with proper information as we prevent and treat whatever gambling concerns that you may have. Sunbet wants YOU to enjoy your gaming experience and as a responsible player, knowing the right option is a great practice.

resetPassword.confirmStep1: We have received your password reset request and we will be sending you an email to reset your password shortly.
resetPassword.pleaseTypeYourUsernameOrEmail: Please type your username or email
resetPassword.PasswordsMatch: You can not set the same old password.
resetPassword.PlayerDoesNotExist: There is no user with specified username or email.
resetPassword.ActorDoesNotExist: There is no user with specified username or email.
resetPassword.UsernamePasswordCombinationIsNotValid: User name and password combination is not valid
resetPassword.AccountLocked: You have exceeded the maximum number of Sign In tries. As a result, the account has been locked for your security and you won't be able to retrieve a new password while your account is being locked. Please contact our Customer Service for further assistance.
resetPassword.SelfExcluded: You requested a self-exclusion. As a result, the account has been temporary locked and you won't be able to retrieve a new password in the exclusion period.
resetPassword.TimedOut: You requested a time-out. As a result, the account has been temporary locked and you won't be able to retrieve a new password in the time-out period.
resetPassword.PasswordIsNotWithinItsAllowedRange: Password must contain at least 6 characters and not more then 12
resetPassword.PasswordsCombinationIsNotValid: New password should match confirm password.
resetPassword.IncorrectSecurityAnswer: Your security answer is incorrect, If you have forgotten your security answer, please contact our customer support for further assistance.

withdrawal.bankDetailsForWithdrawal: Please provide bank details to help process your withdrawal.

frozen.description: Your account has been frozen and cannot proceed the withdrawal request. Please contact our customer support team for further assistance.

VerifiedBankAccount.description: Verification process can take up to 2 hours. You will be notified by email once the account has been verified.

cashier.currentIDrequired: Current ID required for all other bank account not registered with this account.

home.liveDealerDescription: Make your way to the Live Dealer games for your choice of various bonus offers, Place your first bet to get the fun started.
home.sunbetDescription: SUNBET Live Dealer offers the best of live casino games with friendly dealers who are waiting for you to join them at their baccarat and roulette tables.
home.goldDeluxeDescription: Gold Deluxe’s expertise and specialties are focused on online Baccarat, offering a diverse range of products such as Traditional Baccarat, Parlay Baccarat, Multigame Baccarat, Multibet Baccarat, Mobile Baccarat, and even 3D Baccarat.

liveDealer.sunbetDescription: A top choice amongst the leading live online casinos in Asia, SUNBET takes pride in being the experts that set the industry standards for Live Dealer Casinos in the region. SUNBET offers a customizable selection of innovative gaming products to cater to the specific needs of each player.
liveDealer.baccaratDescription: Visit SUNBET with our sizzling-hot Baccarat dealer for the best card game online.
liveDealer.dragonTigerDescription: Bet Dragon, Tiger or Tie, highest card wins. Very simple game! Play live Dragon Tiger against our sexy live dealers.
liveDealer.rouletteDescription: Take a spin at the exciting live roulette wheel and experience the thrill of a live casino without leaving home.
liveDealer.parlayBaccaratDescription: We make Baccarat more fun to play online. Using real cards dealt by real dealers, can you hold the nerves and win?
liveDealer.MultiBaccaratDescription: Enjoy the thrill of Live Baccarat games. Our live dealers will impress you with their games and beauty.
liveDealer.3DBaccaratDescription: Gold Deluxe brings the excitement of Las Vegas style casino gaming to your computer, you will experience a new level of casino realism with our 3D Baccarat games.
